ethakota ibetama atha huru wenawa.kathawe debas kotas hama witama kathitha bhashawenma liyannath, likhitha kotas likhitha bhashawenma liyannath athayi hithayi dekama purudu kara ganna.anek athata likhitha kotas thawath nirmanathmakawa kiyawannata danenna liyanna.hithata gonu wena dewal, pudgalika athdakim, thawath thanakin kiyawu dewal, asu dewal, sitha thula pahala wu nirmanathma windaniya dewal , liyana welawata podu athdakimwalata harawanna.

warga kilomitar 99,300 k wishala dofar pradeshaya me ratata himiwima gana katha dekak mata ahannata labuna.manda athithaye me bimkada ayathwa thibune yemanayatayi.yemanayen kumariyak me ratata diga denawita ayata thaggak lesa me bima labadun bawa eka kathawaka kiyawena athara yemanayata mudal gewa me palatha miladi gath bawa thawath kathawaka sandahan wenawa.mona aakarayata ayithi wuwath dofar palatha ratata mahathma sampathak bawa nam kiwayuthumayi.mehi ek anthayaka pawathinne yemana desha simawayi.namuth godabimen yemanayata yannata nohaki aakarayata desha simawa kalaka sita wasa dama aththe yemanaye pawathina abhyanthara yuddhaya nisa rate siwil palanaya anathurata lakwi athi hethuwenuyi.
onna ithin jiwithe tenshan wadima dawasa lan una.
ee ranasinha premadasa ha mahinda rajapakshayi.
thurya wadana handata uge sirure kisiyam windanayak ho kalambaimak hata gena uu eya prakasha karana bawak mata penuni.
sasare kala pin nisa maha buddhiyakin mora siti dhammika swamin wahanseta ee waradi dana gena niwaradi wime wasanawa labuna.
eekath loku jayagrahanayak.”
